jobDetails: If you like working early mornings, being part of a team and take pride in your work and have an attention to detail and accuracy, please consider working at Boston Organics! Do you find yourself probing for vulnerabilities everywhere you go be it online or in person (pre-corona days)? Do you know how to remedy these exploits? If so, we need you! We are looking for talented out of the box thinkers to join our team to build and secure critical software and infrastructure. You will work with one or several scrum teams to implement and provide overall security engineering expertise to modern software systems but will have ample opportunities for growth. If you thrive in an early startup environment, or are simply looking for more autonomy and the ability to have a large impact, we would love to meet you!

What You’ll Do

Conduct penetration testing throughout company and product lines.Design and implement security-related policies.Analyze source code and security scan reports for security vulnerabilities and develop/implement mitigations.Deploy and maintain modern security incident and event management systems.Develop alerting capabilities based on security intelligence, post incident findings, new threats and vulnerabilities.

What You’ll Need

Strong analytical skills and cross functional knowledge across multiple security disciplines.Working experience with one or more cloud providers, such as Amazon Web Services or Microsoft Azure.Familiar with interpreting the log output of a wide selection of network and host device classes (HIDS, NIDS, Firewalls, Proxies, Routers, Switches, WAF's, Servers, Desktop Controls, Endpoint Protection, etc.).Functional experience with text and data representation and manipulation (XML, HTML, Regular Expressions, JSON, REST, SQL).Packet-level behavioral familiarity with most major TCP/IP application protocols ( DNS, SMTP, HTTP, BGP, LDAP, IMAP, SSH, FTP, KRB5, DHCP, CIFS).Strong working experience with a major scripting language (Python, Bash, Powershell).Working experience managing and maintaining global SIEM deployments.Strong knowledge of DoD 8500.01 DIACAP/DoD 8510.01 RMF IA Controls (IACs).Experience with vulnerability analysis using cyber security tools (e.g., ACAS, Nessus, SCAP, SCC, eMass, STIG Viewer).Creative thinker that leverages unconventional and innovative ideas to solve problems.Comfortable operating in environments subject to regulatory, compliance, and risk-based security requirements.Patience and tolerance for when things just go wrong.Strong interpersonal, verbal presentation and written communication skills.Strong drive, self-motivated, logical, and detail-oriented.Passion for new technologies, software & processes.Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment with multiple deadlines is essential.

Why You’ll Love Working Here!

Highly competitive compensation and benefits package including:Fully-vested 401k matching (up to 10%),100% company-paid comprehensive healthcare,Unlimited sick leave,All federal holidays & 15 days personal leave,Regular virtual and in-person social events,Flexible schedules, educational reimbursements, and much more.

Office hours are flexible with most work performed remotely (as we are a geographically dispersed team), but some actions may require travel and regular team interaction. Most of our team works out of on-trend, workshare office spaces around the nation. Eventually, this position may require a government security clearance.

Skyward Federal is a small (but growing) startup bringing the best of breed to the most exciting & unique missions possible. We work hard but play harder. There is constant room for growth and cross-training depending on what your life goals are. Apply now & start your journey today!

Note: During the coronavirus pandemic, all employees are working from home with only essential travel to client sites (for classified work) authorized.

We are welcoming sales agents with experience in merchant services that want to double and triple their residual profits with the newest, most profitable and compliant programs in card services.

We are currently getting geared up for a huge wave of sales coming in this industry as 70% of US merchants will be updating their payment processing equipment due to a common device that the manufacturer has announced to be “end of life”, meaning the device will no longer be supported. We also anticipate a huge boom once the current Corona-virus/COVID-19 issue is out of the picture.

We are looking for prospectors and closers who want a long term residual book that continues to pay you long after you have stopped working-

Most sales reps working with other companies are sick of being underpaid on their current residual book, we have been a home for these sales reps to bring their book of business over to since 2004. BPS will pay you better with upfront bonuses and help you close your sales. Our back end support that includes helping program equipment, deploy and helping your merchants after the sale is second to none-

Check us out online!

https://www.bpshq.com

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1YeS_crEgBqwJDvyENvyigsOHvlhHvSWo

https://www.bpshq.com/partners

Call us now to get the ball rolling (877) 623-2021 Just ask for Lee or Michael.

Our sales process is so simple and our merchant application is two pages- not to mention we offer free POS systems and Class A smart terminals -

Most of our sales agents have been with us for years as we have been in business for 15 years and we do not assign you to micro managers, you only work with the two top level executives with the company. Make a career with BPS and switch your current clients to a more profitable way of processing that will benefit them by decreasing their bill drastically.

IF YOU HAVE THE FOLLOWING QUALITIES, THIS IS THE OPPORTUNITY FOR YOU!

Extremely comfortable striking up a conversation with anyone

Excellent communication skills

Ability to close in a short sales cycle environment

Merchant services and bankcard industry experience is required

Business Payment Services has been in business since 2004 and has become the home of many sales people of all different levels, all over the country. We pride ourselves on long term relationships with dedicated partners and all the experience, knowledge and integrity has made BPS a best choice in Merchant Services for the last 15 years.

Role: Oracle Integration Cloud expert.

Location: Boston, MA

Duration: long term

Rate: All incl

Start: Monday, Can work remotely until the corona virus situation pass

We are looking for a strong technical OIC expert based out of client location Boston, this is a critical role and we are expecting lot of enhancements, development projects post cloud application go-live.

We are looking for a hands-on experience candidate working with Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC), Oracle Integration Cloud Service (ICS), Oracle Process Cloud Service (PCS).

The Oracle Integration Cloud Specialist will work with the Oracle OIC, ICS, or SOA CS products to integrate SaaS to SaaS and SaaS to on premise applications and will require the following skills :

At least one end to end cloud SaaS /PaaS implementation project.

Knowledge of Integration frameworks offered by SaaS applications.Advanced understanding of Oracle PaaS offerings and Architecture.Basic understanding of integration Security and Oracle Offering.Should have strong understanding of OIC components & capabilities.Must have created packages using pre-built OIC Integration.Strong understanding of OIC adapters, usage of REST, SOA adapters, usage of orchestration integration patters.Experience delivering large integration projects.Basic understanding of Oracle IaaS portfolio.Ability to leverage pre-built integrations, cloud adapters, connections, SaaS applications, etc in the solution.Provide technical expertise, guidelines and leadership in the development and implementation of integration solutions.Exhibit exceptional technical problem solving skills with ability to work independently or in team-oriented manner.Exceptional communication skills (written and oral) to convey technical solution to stakeholders.Experience delivering large integration projects.Extensive experience monitoring, tuning and/or changing complex applications to optimize the product to perform to customer expectations.Strong written and verbal communication skills.Proven ability to work independently and as part of a team in an onshore/offshore model, should be flexible enough to have overlap with onsite team.Should be aware of ITIL best practices, Should have worked on Production support projects - Incident Management, Problem Management, Release management.

Job Duties:

Development and administration of integration / middleware using Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC).

Work and partner on other key initiatives including Oracle Fusion Cloud implementation, Salesforce, Service Max, Web Application.

Design and provide hands-on development of cloud based and enterprise integrations, leveraging API frameworks.

GPAC: Top Commercial Drywall Recruiting Firm in the Nation

I am searching with a reputable, family-friendly Commercial Drywall Contractor for a skilled Senior level Estimator.

The company has been experiencing growth in both work and the size of jobs. They have a need for a skilled estimator to step in and run a team of estimators.

The contractor is running over $25 Million in work annually, & they aren't looking to stop there. Even amongst the Corona fear that is happening, they are expanding.

They have a family first priority and a strong continued plan for growth with their backlog of work. They have built their culture around hard work, competition in the Boston market.

Their projects orbit around hospitals, medical care facilities, institutional, schools, and office projects.

Requirements: 8+ years of experience in estimating and management of diverse, metal stud, commercial drywall projects, OST and Quick Bid estimating software background.

If you have any questions about this position email derek.rintala@gogpac.com or give Derek Rintala a call at (605)-809-8572

All qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, age, color, sex (including pregnancy), religion, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, military status, genetic information, or any other status protected by applicable laws or regulations.

GPAC (Growing People and Companies) is an award-winning search firm specializing in placing quality professionals within multiple industries across the United States for the past 30 years. You will receive a $300 SIGN-ON BONUS when you work 300 hours with us.

Caregiver for Needham with car

Always Here Home Care, Inc.'s caregivers provide non-medical home care services to seniors, with a focus on companionship, personal care, homemaking, and transportation services, to enable our clients to continue living comfortably at home.

As a caregiver, your personality and skills will bring a better quality of life to seniors and adults with disabilities. Your duties on a typical day may include the following:

Promoting client independence and wellnessAccompanying to a museum or community eventShopping with or for a clientCooking nutritious mealsProviding personal care (bathing, toileting, medication reminders)Providing transportation to appointmentsCalling the office team to report an emergency or important change in a client's condition

Always Here Offers:

Pay is Negotiable Flexible schedule: full or part time, based on your availabilityALL SHIFTS available: morning, afternoon, night, overnight; 4 ,6, 8 , & 12 hours shiftsHoliday pay: time and a halfTraining and on-going supportA team that is available 24/7: caregivers are never alone! Employee referral bonus programBenefits: health, dental, and 401(k) with 4% company matchingOpen minded for new ideas and suggestions

Requirements:

Compassion & dedication to providing excellent careDirect care experienceCell phone with internet accessMA Driver's License with a clean driving recordA reliable car with current Insurance and MA Registration.

Great extras that are preferred but NOT required:

Strong organizational & communication skillsA CNA, HHA or CPR and/or First Aid Certification

**** All your information will be kept confidential according to EEOC guidelines ****
